item.description:
Okay, let's try this again.  :)

 

We're looking for more people to join our summer kickball league.  There are currently 3 teams, but 4 would be ideal, so grab your friends, neighbors, and strangers and join us on Wednesday, July 25th for our pre-season party!  You'll meet with other players and get answers to all of your questions.

*If you join and pay at the party (or online by the 25th) you will not be charged a late fee and you will still be able to get a team t-shirt.

*You are also welcome to join online using the following link:

RI Sports & Social Club - Summer Kickball League

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A few of us in the Providence Collective are playing kickball again this season, and we'd like you to join us for our kickoff party.  You can meet other team members, ask questions, and join one of the teams in the league.  (We recommend you join "The Collective". )

Games are every Wednesday evening through September 26, 2012.  The start times vary week to week, but they start between 6:15 and 7:30, and are over by 8:15.  Cost to join for the season is $50.

Once you join, you can volunteer to ref games and earn $10 for each time you ref toward a future season.

And, while it is not mandatory, each week after the game we head to a local watering hole to enjoy the rest of the evening.

 

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a large group of us, so we should be easy to find.
item.name: Kickball Summer Season Kickoff Party - Part Deux
